songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Becky like to drop it down low
She do whatever you say so
Her favorite song is "Ain't No Fun"
She sing it at the top of her lungs
She probably dancin' on a bar stool (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
She like to show off all her tattoos (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
And every weekend she just let loose (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
Know why she always in the bathroom (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
Ayo, Becky like to sip red wine
She say I think I'll have a good time
She showin' off her body, I be like mmm-mmm
Goddamn, that chick is fine, she already
Spent all of her paycheck (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
It ain't even Saturday yet (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
A lot of people say she basic (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
And I'm in love (Whoa, whoa, whoa)

[Verse]
Ayy, she the type to throw a pint glass at some jealous thots
Also she the type that might overdose on jello shots
See her in the corner with her homegirls double fistin'
Gettin' things started quickly like she on a mission
You know it's a vibe when she start to feel the beat (Uh-huh)
When she lets her hair down and take them high heels off her feet
Yeah, she starts to feel herself (Uh)
You can see her lose her innocence
You can hear her screaming "I'm the baddest bitch in this bitch"
Gettin' into fights (Fights)
Bummin' Marlboro lights (Lights)
She's had many cloudy mornings and a lot of blurry nights
And as far as stairs go (Uh)
Yeah, she's fallen down some flights (Ouch)
She's exactly who I'd like to take with me to paradise
You can catch me smokin' pre-rolls on a beach in San Diego
To a hater, I will wave at you and say "Hasta luego"
I am a-okay with this woman I choose
Lots of sex and lots of booze
Life is like a carnival cruise, ayy

[Chorus]
Becky like to drop it down low
She do whatever you say so
Her favorite song is "Ain't No Fun"
She sing it at the top of her lungs
She probably dancin' on a bar stool (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
She like to show off all her tattoos (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
And every weekend she just let loose (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
Know why she always in the bathroom (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
Ayo, Becky like to sip red wine
She say I think I'll have a good time
She showin' off her body, I be like mmm-mmm
Goddamn, that chick is fine, she already
Spent all of her paycheck (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
It ain't even Saturday yet (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
A lot of people say she basic (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
And I'm in love (Whoa, whoa, whoa)
songs.title: Becky
